name: fake-tears
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF.
flavor_text.emerald: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF stat.
